article_title: Covid-19 Is Nothing Like the Spanish Flu
article_description: A widely cited stat about death rates seems to argue otherwise  but it s surely incorrect  So how d it end up in the research literature
article_content: Unfortunately  the two purported sources for the 2 5 percent fatality rate were published more than 40 years ago and their authors are no longer with us  I was able to reach public health expert Niall Johnson  however  primary author of a 2002 study that prod   5230 chars
